Don't know anything about Expelled from Paradise but I read the whole Manga of Deadman Wonderland and I bloody Loved it! (No pun intended)

But know this, The Manga is a lot better than the Anime. The Anime was good but there are some things that I think didn't make it in the anime that did in the Manga.

Like a Crossdressing Gay guy! [/bq]
For UC9

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558399ee6368726ce6001a9c#post_558399ee6368726ce6001a9c
[bq="uc9"]Random question for you weabs:
Is deadman wonderland any good?
Is Expelled from paradise any good?[/bq]
Deadman Wonderland is super good. A lot of really good action scenes and some good mystery to it. The manga took a really long hiatus and had sort of an abrupt ending because the illustrator was pregnant.

topics.body:
You know what I would like to see in a video game?  Them starting off with making a team of very interesting characters complete with deep back stories, really good 3d models, fully voiced, of all sorts of backgrounds; then first boss the difficulty of the game goes to 11 and your entire team just gets almost instantly pounded into mush and the only reason why you survive is that you're such a non-threat that by the time it gets to you your team mates have already almost killed it and it's already bleeding out dying.

Like the game starts out with you thinking your superman and completely immortal then it turns out your character is a complete scrublord and the only reason why you're alive and been surviving up to that point is that you're such a non-threat that the enemies didn't even bother with you.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
